blocks.name: constmap
blocks.content: A constant (represented without dummy variables) is an element of a function set. _Note: In the following development, we will be quite often quantifying over functions and points in N-dimensional space (which are equivalent to functions from an "index set"). Many of the following theorems exist to transfer standard facts about functions to elements of function sets._ (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-May-2015.)

blocks.name: mapco2g
blocks.content: Renaming indices in a tuple, with sethood as antecedents. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapco2g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c3)), wcel(ccom(c1, c4), co(c2, cmap, c0)))
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c3)), wcel(ccom(c1, c4), co(c2, cmap, c0)), wf(ccom(c1, c4), c0, c2))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c3), wf(ccom(c1, c4), c0, c2))
  sylan(wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c3), wf(ccom(c1, c4), c0, c2), wf(c1, c3, c2))
  elmapi(c1, c2, c3)
  fco(c1, c3, c2, c4, c0)
  elmapd(ccom(c1, c4), c2, c0, universe, universe, w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c3)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c3), wcel(c2, universe))
  nsyl2(wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(co(c2, cmap, c3), emptycls))
  n0i(c1, co(c2, cmap, c3))
  ovprc1(c2, cmap, c3)
  reldmmap()
  simp1(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mapco2g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c3)‚àß(c4 : c0 ‚Üí c3))‚Üí(c1 ‚àò c4)‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c0))
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c3)‚àß(c4 : c0 ‚Üí c3)), (c1 ‚àò c4)‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c0), ((c1 ‚àò c4): c0 ‚Üí c2))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c3), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c3), ((c1 ‚àò c4): c0 ‚Üí c2))
  sylan(c1 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c3), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c3), ((c1 ‚àò c4): c0 ‚Üí c2), (c1 : c3 ‚Üí c2))
  elmapi(c1, c2, c3)
  fco(c1, c3, c2, c4, c0)
  elmapd((c1 ‚àò c4), c2, c0, universe, universe, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c3)‚àß(c4 : c0 ‚Üí c3)))
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c3), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c3), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  nsyl2(c1 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c3), c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c2[‚Ü¶]c3)= ‚àÖ)
  n0i(c1, (c2[‚Ü¶]c3))
  ovprc1(c2, cmap, c3)
  reldmmap()
  simp1(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]c3), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c3))
}

blocks.name: mapco2
blocks.content: Post-composition (renaming indices) of a mapping viewed as a point. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-May-2015.)

blocks.name: mapfzcons
blocks.content: Extending a one-based mapping by adding a tuple at the end results in another mapping. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapfzcons(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cun(c1, csn(cop(c4, c3))), co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c4))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
} = {
  3eltr4g(cun(c1, csn(cop(c4, c3))), co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c4)), cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))), co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)))
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))), co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wf(cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), c2))
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wf(cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), c2), wf(cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cun(c2, c2)))
  syl21anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wf(cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cun(c2, c2)), wf(c1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), c2), wf(csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1)), c2), wceq(cin(co(nat1, cfz, c0), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1))), emptycls))
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wf(c1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), c2), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2))
  sylancl(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wf(c1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), c2)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, c0), universe))
  ovex(nat1, cfz, c0)
  elmapg(c2, universe, co(nat1, cfz, c0), universe, c1)
  fssd(csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1)), c2, csn(c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wf(csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1)), csn(c3)), wf1o(csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1)), csn(c3)))
  sylancr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wf1o(csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1)), csn(c3)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), universe), wcel(c3, c2))
  ovex(c0, caddc, nat1)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2))
  f1osng(co(c0, caddc, nat1), universe, c3, c2)
  f1of(csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1)), csn(c3))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2), wss(csn(c3), c2))
  snssi(c3, c2)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cin(co(nat1, cfz, c0), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1))), emptycls))
  fzp1disj(nat1, c0)
  fun(c1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), c2, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1)), c2)
  feq23d(cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cun(c2, c2), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)))
  eqcomd(cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)))
  sylancr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), csn(co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, co(nat1, cmin, nat1))))
  1z()
  syl6eleq(c0, cfv(cuz, co(nat1, cmin, nat1)), cn0, w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2))
  eqtr4i(cn0, cfv(cuz, co(nat1, cmin, nat1)), cfv(cuz, nat0))
  nn0uz()
  fveq2i(cuz, co(nat1, cmin, nat1), nat0)
  1m1e0()
  fzsuc2(nat1, c0)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cun(c2, c2), c2))
  unidm(c2)
  sylancl(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wcel(cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))), co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wf(cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), c2)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), universe))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  simpld(wcel(c1, co(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, c0), universe))
  elmapex(c1, c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0))
  ovex(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  elmapg(c2, universe, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), universe, cun(c1, csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))))
  uneq2i(c1, csn(cop(c4, c3)), csn(cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)))
  sneqi(cop(c4, c3), cop(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3))
  opeq1i(c4, c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  oveq2i(c2, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c4), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2i(nat1, cfz, c4, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
}

blocks.name: mapfzcons1
blocks.content: Recover prefix mapping from an extended mapping. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapfzcons1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wceq(cres(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c4))), co(nat1, cfz, c2)), c0))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c2, caddc, nat1))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cres(cun(c0, csn(cop(c3, c4))), co(nat1, cfz, c2)), c0, cun(cres(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c2)), cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))), cun(c0, cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  uneq1d(cres(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c2)), cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2)), c0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  3syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wceq(cres(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c2)), c0), wf(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c2), c1), wfn(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c2)))
  elmapi(c0, c1, co(nat1, cfz, c2))
  ffn(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c2), c1)
  fnresdm(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c2))
  resundir(c0, csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))
  eqtr2i(c0, cun(c0, cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))), cun(c0, emptycls))
  uneq2i(c0, cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2)), emptycls)
  mpbir(wceq(cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2)), emptycls), wceq(cdm(cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))), emptycls))
  eqtri(cdm(cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))), emptycls, cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), cdm(csn(cop(c3, c4)))))
  dmres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))
  mp2an(wceq(cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), cdm(csn(cop(c3, c4)))), emptycls), wss(cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), cdm(csn(cop(c3, c4)))), cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), csn(co(c2, caddc, nat1)))), wceq(cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), csn(co(c2, caddc, nat1))), emptycls))
  ax-mp(wss(cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), cdm(csn(cop(c3, c4)))), cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), csn(co(c2, caddc, nat1)))), wss(cdm(csn(cop(c3, c4))), csn(co(c2, caddc, nat1))))
  sseqtri(cdm(csn(cop(c3, c4))), csn(co(c2, caddc, nat1)), csn(c3))
  dmsnopss(c3, c4)
  sneqi(c3, co(c2, caddc, nat1))
  sslin(cdm(csn(cop(c3, c4))), csn(co(c2, caddc, nat1)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))
  fzp1disj(nat1, c2)
  sseq0(cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), cdm(csn(cop(c3, c4)))), cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), csn(co(c2, caddc, nat1))))
  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2)), emptycls), wceq(cdm(cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))), emptycls)), wrel(cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  relres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2))
  reldm0(cres(csn(cop(c3, c4)), co(nat1, cfz, c2)))
  un0(c0)
}

blocks.name: mapfzcons1cl
blocks.content: A nonempty mapping has a prefix. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-May-2015.)

blocks.name: mapfzcons2
blocks.content: Recover added element from an extended mapping. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapfzcons2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(cun(c0, csn(cop(c4, c3))), c4), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c2, caddc, nat1))
} = {
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(cun(c0, csn(cop(c4, c3))), c4), c3), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wn(wcel(c4, cdm(c0))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c4, universe))
  eqeltri(c4, universe, co(c2, caddc, nat1))
  ovex(c2, caddc, nat1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c3, universe))
  elex(c3, c1)
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wcel(c3, c1)), wn(wcel(c4, cdm(c0))), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), csn(c4)), emptycls))
  syl6eq(cin(cdm(c0), csn(c4)), emptycls, cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), csn(c4)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wcel(c3, c1)))
  ineq1d(cdm(c0), csn(c4), co(nat1, cfz, c2), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wcel(c3, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), co(nat1, cfz, c2)))
  fdmd(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c2), c1, wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c2))))
  elmapi(c0, c1, co(nat1, cfz, c2))
  eqtri(cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), csn(c4)), emptycls, cin(co(nat1, cfz, c2), csn(co(c2, caddc, nat1))))
  ineq2i(co(nat1, cfz, c2), csn(c4), csn(co(c2, caddc, nat1)))
  sneqi(c4, co(c2, caddc, nat1))
  fzp1disj(nat1, c2)
  disjsn(cdm(c0), c4)
  fsnunfv(c4, universe, c3, universe, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mapfzcons2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶](1[...]c2))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((c0 ‚ãÉ { < c4, c3 > })` c4)= c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c2[+]1)
} = {
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶](1[...]c2))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), ((c0 ‚ãÉ { < c4, c3 > })` c4)= c3, c4 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà dom(c0))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶](1[...]c2))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltri(c4, universe, (c2[+]1))
  ovex(c2, caddc, nat1)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶](1[...]c2)), c3 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c3, c1)
  sylib((c0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶](1[...]c2))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), ¬¨ c4 ‚àà dom(c0), (dom(c0)‚ãÇ { c4 })= ‚àÖ)
  syl6eq((dom(c0)‚ãÇ { c4 }), emptycls, ((1[...]c2)‚ãÇ { c4 }), (c0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶](1[...]c2))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1))
  ineq1d(dom(c0), { c4 }, (1[...]c2), (c0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶](1[...]c2))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶](1[...]c2)), c3 ‚àà c1, dom(c0)=(1[...]c2))
  fdmd(c0, (1[...]c2), c1, c0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶](1[...]c2)))
  elmapi(c0, c1, (1[...]c2))
  eqtri(((1[...]c2)‚ãÇ { c4 }), emptycls, ((1[...]c2)‚ãÇ {(c2[+]1)}))
  ineq2i((1[...]c2), { c4 }, {(c2[+]1)})
  sneqi(c4, (c2[+]1))
  fzp1disj(nat1, c2)
  disjsn(dom(c0), c4)
  fsnunfv(c4, universe, c3, universe, c0)
}
